@usedefault
h1. Access Management

{{html:
<form ng-submit="addUser()"  ng-controller="AccountAccessManagementController">
    <table class="table users-table">
        <tr class="header">
            <th class="username-text-container">
                <input type="text" placeholder="Username or email address" class="username-text" ng-model="newUser.name"
                    typeahead="user.name for user in unauthorizedUsers | filter:$viewValue | limitTo:8"
                    typeahead-editable="false">
            </th>
            <th><input type="submit" class="btn" value="Add"></input></th>
        </tr>
        <tr ng-cloak ng-repeat="user in cloudSpaceUsers">
            <td>{[user.name]}</td>
            <td><a href="#" ng-click="deleteUser(currentSpace, user)" class="icon-remove-sign"></a></td>
        </tr>
    </table>
</form>
}}
